The dataValidR is a set of functions to be used for testing and validating data.

```{r, eval = FALSE, echo = TRUE}

library(dataValidR)

df <- data.frame(col1 = c(1:10),
                 col2 = letters[1:10],
                 col3 = c(rep(NA, 3), 1:7))

t1 <- test_unique(df$col1)
t2 <- test_values(df$col2, letters[1:10])
t3 <- test_null_values(df$col3)

tests <- rbind(t1, t2, t3)

```
